Label: Substrate
Help: What is the fungus growing on?

Help: What is/are the dominant color(s) of the hymenium?

Help: How is the crust growing across the substrate?

Label: Hymenophore
Help: What is the configuration of the hymenophore?

Label: Texture
Help: What is the texture of the fresh fruiting body?

Label: Spore print
Help: What is the color of the spore print?

Label: Hyphal system
Help: Are there just generative hyphae present or also skeletal and binding hyphae?

Label: Clamps
Help: Are there clamps anywhere on the hyphae (including at the base of basidia)?

Label: Basida septa
Help: Is the crust a homobasidiomycete (without basidia septa) or heterobasidiomycete (with basidia septa)?

Label: Basidia type
Help: What type of basidia are present?

Help: What is the shape of the basidia?

Help: What is the average length of basidia in µm?

Label: Basidia width
Help: What is the average width of basidia in µm?

Label: Sterigmata
Help: How many sterigmata do the basidia have?

Label: Basidiospore amyloidy
Help: Are the basidiospore inamyloid, amyloid, or dextrinoid in Melzer's reagent?

Label: Basidiospore shape
Help: What is the shape of the basidiospores (as a function of its length by width quotient)?

Label: Basidiospore ornamentation
Help: Is the basidiospore smooth or does it have some sort of ornamentation?

Label: Basidiospore length
Help: What is the average length of basidiospores in µm?

Label: Basidiospore width
Help: What is the average width of basidiospores in µm?

Label: Basidiospore quotient
Help: What is the averag ratio of basidiospore length by width?

Label: Cystidia
Help: Are there any cystidia present?

Label: Hyphidia
Help: Are there any hyphidia present?
